JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Duties and Responsibilities      Improve functionality of existing systems    Strong English written and verbal communication skills    Comfortable with strict deadlines    Works well in a team setting    Can multitask, adapt to shifting priorities, detail oriented    Good work ethic, including sense of individual responsibility    Comfortable working on new products in a growing company    Must be analytical, flexible, innovative, and self-motivated   Expectations   Basic Linux knowledge is a plus    Proficient understanding of code versioning tools like GIT    Experience in web-service & API handling    Very good experience on application deployments on to both Unix and Windows servers    4 to 5 years of Full-time post-secondary education (B.E B.Tech M.Sc in ITCSE, MCA)
